author: jbeard
msg: Intermediate commit. Primarily added new tasks to build.

author: jbeard
msg: Intermediate (broken) commit. Includes the following changes:
* initial stylesheet that gets passed into topo-sort.xsl is treated specially as source in the stylesheet, and not included in dependency list
* add stylehseets to build modules for each language frontend (javascript, python, bash) from xslt list.
* dependency paths in stylesheets are rooted in src/xslt
* stylesheets get generally built, reference transparently in target/ dir (src/xslt/* mapped to target/xslt/*)
* Add generating module code to build process.
* Refactor existing frontend to use these generated modules.
* Add to build process automated testing of each language frontend to ensure consistency.
